title: TGRoss
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Did They See Nvidia’s Drop Coming?
items.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Nvidia is down over 15% from its recent highs, with DeepSeek as the latest catalyst. But let’s be real—this pullback was brewin...

items.title: Market Participation is Holding Up
items.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Market participation is surging. Just a week ago, only 27% of stocks traded above their 50-day moving averages—now, that number...

items.title: Reminder – We are Not Index Investors

items.title: Investors Still on the Offense
items.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Today's chart tracks the ratio of XLP – the S&P Consumer Staples ETF – to the S&P 500 since the October 2022 bull market began....
